document_data.name: Passion Vine
document_data.mainbody: '''Passion vine''' was a fragrant blossoming vine that grew in the tropical climate of the [[Vilhon Reach]].
document_data.Habitats: Noble gardens of [[Arrabar]] in the Vilhon Reach were filled with overpowering scents of flowering plants, including [[bougainvillea]]s, passion vines, [[orchid]]s, and [[wandering heart]]s. Notably, the flowers could be found in the gardens surrounding mansions of [[House Matrell]] and [[House Pharaboldi]].
